articles.title: Covid still killing Americans faster than guns, cars and flu combined - The Star Online
articles.description: NEW YORK: Even with half the U.S. vaccinated, Covid-19 continues to kill people faster than guns, car crashes and influenza combined, according to a review of mortality data.
articles.content:

articles.title: Canadian government approaches reopening border for fully vaccinated Americans - CBC.ca
articles.description: As the government looks to a possible mid-August reopening of the U.S. border for fully vaccinated travellers, people affected are still looking for details, such as whether the U.S. will reciprocate.
